title: !!!!Guys, I DID IT!!!!
body:
https://i.imgur.com/8GJbPfU.png
Lmfao why do I find this so funny

replies.body: I dislike Discount Bot strongly. Why do they give me skins on sale for champions where I already own a skin??? PLEASE FOR THE LOVE OF GALIO GIVE ME HAZMAT HEIMEERRRRRDINGGGEEERRR
I had that too, but I actually have a fair amount of skins so ye... they gave me blue essence when I have almost 100k and i'm like i'm not gonna use that essence..
Same problem here. Even when I go on my smurf accounts, its the same thing.

My friend angered Discount Bot. Despite owning very few skins, 4-5 of the offers (for his most played champs) are always the same skin, and it's always the ONE skin they have he doesn't want. Discount Bot is clearly self-aware and taunting him.
